page.title: 122358 HALLS FARM
page.content: Hall's Farm is farmed by a tenant farmer.It is situated at the A701 Moffat road 3 miles from Penicuik.The farm land covers 1100 acres including 800 acres of moorland.The farm house is occupied by the farmer,wife and children.It is sheltered by a copse of conifers to the west,hardwoods to the east and north east.Four farm workers including a shepherd are employed at the farm. Land Use Mainly grazing,The farm has 2 ploughed fields for barley,and other winter feeding.Some of the land is marshy with rushes. Livestock- 700 black faced sheep,200 beef cattle, a few fresian cows for milk. The Blackburn runs through the farm- land providing water for animals,it is clear but brackish in colour.
